QuestData.Title: Waxing Crescent
QuestData.Description: His captor is familiar to me. He is one of Aluriel's lieutenants and a skilled spell-fencer at that. You will need Silgryn's help to retrieve the key to Vanthir's prison.$b$bOur friend's life hangs in the balance. Even if we manage to wrestle him from the executioner's grasp, he may well Wither before we can act.$b$bI need you to take an Arcan'dor fruit to him. They are precious, and few, but for Vanthir this is the only chance he has.$b$bGo quickly, and good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Vanthir and give him an Arcan'dor fruit.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Vanthir shudders violently and stares blankly ahead. He does not seem to be aware of your presence.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Vanthir's hands dart up to snatch the fruit from your grasp.>
